name: Horns of Fear
description: Horns of Fear is a third-person psychological horror game set in a mysterious mansion...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better, Keyboard, mouse, WebGL
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 1920x1080, Keyboard, mouse, WebGL
